issue: I'm unable to log in to my account.
solution: Ensure the user is using the correct credentials and the account is not locked.

issue: Login keeps failing with an unknown error.
solution: Investigate logs for authentication errors and retry.

issue: I can't sign in after resetting my password.
solution: Check if the password reset was successful and verify token validity.

issue: The login page keeps reloading.
solution: Check browser compatibility and clear cache/cookies.

issue: I get stuck on the loading spinner after entering credentials.
solution: Look into frontend auth callback handling.

issue: Logging in redirects me to a blank page.
solution: Investigate frontend routing after login.

issue: I’m stuck at the login screen despite entering correct credentials.
solution: Check backend auth response and session handling.

issue: Two accounts seem to be linked incorrectly when I try to login.
solution: Investigate user ID mapping in authentication service.

issue: My account is marked inactive when logging in.
solution: Verify account status in admin panel.

issue: I’m getting a network error when logging in.
solution: Check API gateway logs and DNS resolution.

issue: The login button does nothing.
solution: Inspect browser console and JS network calls.

issue: I never received the verification email.
solution: Ask the user to check spam folder and resend from admin panel.

issue: The verification link is expired.
solution: Generate a new verification token and email it again.

issue: The verification link says 'invalid token'.
solution: Validate the format and expiration of the token.

issue: I clicked the email link but nothing happened.
solution: Check browser compatibility and JS errors.

issue: My email was verified but the app still says unverified.
solution: Check backend user verification status and cache.

issue: The verification email was sent to the wrong address.
solution: Confirm user profile email and resend.

issue: I mistyped my email and didn’t get the link.
solution: Update the email in the profile and regenerate verification.

issue: The email has broken formatting.
solution: Ensure HTML rendering is correct and content is escaped.

issue: I received two verification emails.
solution: Confirm only one token is active and invalidate old ones.

issue: I clicked the link but it redirected to a 404 page.
solution: Verify routing logic and token parsing on the frontend.

issue: My verification link works on desktop but not on mobile.
solution: Check for responsive or redirect issues in mobile view.

issue: I was charged twice this month.
solution: Look into the billing logs for duplicate charges.

issue: Why was I billed $49? I thought this was free.
solution: Check subscription tier and notify user of trial expiration.

issue: I canceled but still got billed.
solution: Check cancellation status and refund if needed.

issue: Can I switch to a yearly plan?
solution: Guide the user to pricing settings to update plan.

issue: My receipt has the wrong company name.
solution: Allow custom billing info edits in admin panel.

issue: The invoice I received is missing tax details.
solution: Review billing system's tax calculation settings.

issue: I need a refund for this month's charge.
solution: Verify charge eligibility and initiate refund.

issue: Billing history is not showing the latest charges.
solution: Check cache invalidation and update schedule.

issue: The payment method I used was declined.
solution: Prompt user to update their billing information.

issue: I accidentally selected the wrong plan.
solution: Allow plan downgrade and partial refunds.

issue: I want to pause my subscription temporarily.
solution: Offer pause/resume functionality in subscription settings.

issue: I received a password reset email I didn't request.
solution: Check for possible compromise and force logout sessions.

issue: My account got hacked.
solution: Freeze the account and investigate recent logins.

issue: I'm getting 2FA errors.
solution: Reset the 2FA settings and re-enroll user.

issue: The magic login link doesn't work.
solution: Check for expired token and reissue.

issue: I'm locked out after too many login attempts.
solution: Unlock the account and notify the user.

issue: Login fails when using SSO.
solution: Check identity provider logs and token audience.

issue: My session keeps expiring too quickly.
solution: Increase session TTL and check token validity.

issue: I lost access to my authenticator app.
solution: Verify identity and provide recovery method.

issue: I keep getting signed out automatically.
solution: Check token rotation and cookie expiry settings.

issue: My security settings got reset after the update.
solution: Restore from backup and review update script.

issue: I see a new device login I don't recognize.
solution: Confirm IP/device fingerprinting and alert the user.

issue: The app is really slow today.
solution: Check for service degradation and active incidents.

issue: Page takes 10+ seconds to load.
solution: Optimize slow DB queries and use caching.

issue: Uploading files is very sluggish.
solution: Investigate S3 latency or frontend compression.

issue: Search results are timing out.
solution: Check Elasticsearch query performance.

issue: The dashboard hangs indefinitely.
solution: Check client logs and websocket connection health.

issue: Report generation takes forever.
solution: Optimize batch job performance and pagination.

issue: Mobile app performance is much worse than desktop.
solution: Profile frontend rendering and API usage on mobile.

issue: My screen freezes when scrolling down.
solution: Reduce DOM nodes and lazy-load heavy components.

issue: Every action takes 5 seconds or more.
solution: Profile frontend and backend trace for latency.

issue: Graphs load very slowly.
solution: Cache aggregation results and optimize data joins.

issue: It’s fast in staging but slow in production.
solution: Compare infra configs and DB indexes across environments.
